decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority (before the building(s) is/are occupied/used).
Condition : 2 - That this concent for a limited period of five years expiring on 13 September 2000,  whereupon the advert shall be removed.

Condition : 3 - All advertisements displays, and any site used for the display of advertisements shall be maintained in a clean and tidy condition to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 4 - Any structure or hoarding erected or use principally for the purpose of displaying advertisements shall be maintained in a safe condition.
Condition : 5 - Where any advertisement is required under these regulations to be removed, the removal shall be carried out to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 6 - No advertisement is to be displayed without the permission of the owner of the site or any other person with an interest in the site entitled to grant planning permission.

Condition : 7 - Noadvertismentt shall be sited or displayed so as to obscure, or hinder, the ready interpretation of any road sign, railway sign or aid to navigation by water or air so as to otherwise render hazardous the use of any highway, railway, waterway ( including any coastal waters) or aerodrome (civil or military).
description: INSTALLATION OF TWELVE FLAGS TO EXISTING FLAGPOLES.
